he Hand of Maegera was an elemental created by the mad fire giant Gommoth to aid the cult of Maegera that dwelled inside the volcanic caverns of Mount Hotenow.
The elemental was crated from some form of white stone combined with what was referred to as the "purest flame". It vaguely resembled a massive flamespiker, a type of elemental found in Mount Hotenow that combined the elements of fire, earth, and air.
The Hand of Maegera was created as a gift from Gommoth to the red dragon Karrundax, to signify the dragons alliance with the cult of Maegera. In truth the Hand of Maegera remained loyal only to Gommoth, and fed information about the young dragons activities to its fire giant master.
Gommoths elemental construct was destroyed in the , by the Heroes of the Sleeping Dragon Bridge when they stormed the Caverns of Karrundax to slay the red dragon.
